Variable.Name: CfgUnivChs
Variable.Comment: cpCOe universal channels configuration

Variable.Name: ChDir
Variable.Comment: Channel direction (0=IN, 1=OUT)

Variable.Name: ChTyp
Variable.Comment: Channel type

Variable.Name: ActPrbMin
Variable.Comment: Active probe minimum value

Variable.Name: ActPrbMax
Variable.Comment: Active probe maximum value

Variable.Name: FiltSamplesNo
Variable.Comment: Number of samples for filtering (0-9)

Variable.Name: PrbOff
Variable.Comment: Probe offset to adjust readed values (only for AIn)

Variable.Name: UpdThrsh
Variable.Comment: Minimum variation to make the slave notify the change to the master (only for AIn)

Variable.Name: EnSafeMode
Variable.Comment: Safe mode enabling (FALSE=freeze output, TRUE=execute pattern)

Variable.Name: OfflinePattern
Variable.Comment: Pattern in case of offline if EnSafeMode=TRUE

Variable.Name: ActPrbAlrmDT
Variable.Comment: [Only in case of active probe AIn] Active probe alarm delay time

Variable.Name: ActPrbMinDelta
Variable.Comment: [Only in case of active probe AIn] Minimum variation to get during MinPeriod to avoid to trigger active probe alarm

Variable.Name: ActPrbMinPeriod
Variable.Comment: [Only in case of active probe AIn] Minimum period in which probe value must change at least of MinDelta, otherwise active probe alarm is triggered

Variable.Name: UI_CurrUnivChIndex
Variable.Comment: Current universal channel being modified from UI (0-10, different values means no one)

Variable.Name: UI_EnFilter
Variable.Comment: Used in the enable of the class Filter_CPCOE

Variable.Name: UI_EnFilterDin
Variable.Comment: Used in the enable of the class FilterDin_CPCOE

Variable.Name: UI_EnFilterDinCountFreq
Variable.Comment: Used in the enable of the class FilterDinCountFreq_CPCOE

Variable.Name: UI_EnUnivChDirIn
Variable.Comment: Used in the enable of the class UnivChTypIn_CPCOE

Variable.Name: UI_EnUnivChDirOut
Variable.Comment: Used in the enable of the class UnivChTypOut_CPCOE

Variable.Name: UI_PredUnivChIndex
Variable.Comment: Previous channel index

Variable.Name: UI_UnivChsDirIn
Variable.Comment: Enable fields for universal channels values configured as inputs (R)

Variable.Name: UI_UnivChsDirOut
Variable.Comment: Enable fields for universal channels values configured as outputs (R/W)
